entry.title: Our research paper, ‘Saila: Human Interface Device (HID) Injection Protection with Smartphone-Based Passwordless Security,’ was presented at the 44th IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS 2024) and has been officially published in IEEE Xplore! This work introduces an innovative approach to securing HID devices using passwordless authentication via smartphones.

entry.content:
“Our research paper, ‘Saila: Human Interface Device (HID) Injection Protection with Smartphone-Based Passwordless Security,’ was presented at the 44th IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS 2024) and has been officially published in IEEE Xplore!
